title: Like if you think Moonflair Spellblade should be on SR.
body:
It is hard to get both armor and AP on SR. This makes matchups against champs such as Zed very difficult, as you are forced to rush {{item:3157}} due to a lack of variety. But it doesn't have to be so! Indeed, on others maps their exists an item that is perfect for AP champs that need a little bit of tank to survive the ADC meta. But alas, it doesn't exist in the game's primary map, Summoner's Rift. I for one think it should be transfered over. Obviously it would need some fine tuning, but Rito pls.

http://pa1.narvii.com/5938/134c6533cfc3db6e802bdfd8113d5fc325292814_hq.gif
PRAISE THE MOON!

> 
> http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d5/Moonflair_Spellblade_item.png/revision/latest?cb=20131123191052
> +50 magic resistance
> +50 armor
> +50 ability power
> 
> Passive
> UNIQUE â€“ TENACITY: Reduces the duration of all crowd control effects by 35%, except for Suppression, Stasis and Airborne effects such as Knockbacks, Knockups and Pulls.

I'm not sure if Mooflair Spellblade is exactly what we need, but it would certainly help. Mages definitely need a little more variety right now.

> Mages definitely need a little more variety right now.


https://i.imgur.com/vB9B5h.jpg?Noredirect

I do what I want.

I would fear ap tanks would be to much of a problem.  Rod of ages and that would give a lot of stats for only 2 items.
Maw gives a lot of stats for one item
And it's 170% gold efficient!
Yea what a bs item

Maybe nerf the Magic Resist on the SR version. This would mean that unless the enemy is almost all AD Moonblade would be a poor tank item (no health and low MR). The lack of AP/AD items makes champs like Zed or Talon annoying to fight due to the strict limitation of what you can build against them. They aren't even OP or broken, just limiting.
Zed is to easy to counter, introducing more armor options would basically make him hell. (That item with Zhonyas, would basically make any mage unkillable, 100 Armor and MR, plus 150 AP AND tenacity.

It doesn't make mages unkillable on TT or Dominion.

Though to be fair, it serves a different function there and would probably need to be nerfed for SR.
Stick to memes

Why not both?
